author: María Alejandra Trujillo
title: Boots Shoppers Frenzy: Iconic Vera Wang Perfume Slashed by £44 Ahead of Mother's Day
text:
Boots has unleashed a wave of excitement among fragrance aficionados with a substantial discount on the coveted Vera Wang Princess for Women Eau de Toilette. In a strategic move to celebrate Mother's Day, the high street beauty giant is offering the 100ml bottles at an astonishing price of £22, down from their regular £66. This revelation, initially shared by an elated customer on the Extreme Couponing and Bargains UK group on Facebook, has sparked a shopping spree among perfume enthusiasts eager to snag the luxury scent at a fraction of its usual cost.
Exceptional Savings for Beauty Lovers
The discount on Vera Wang's Princess perfume is part of a broader initiative by Boots to make luxury beauty more accessible in the lead-up to Mother's Day. Shoppers can enjoy a 20% off on all premium beauty and No7 items with a special Sun Vouchers discount. This promotion offers an excellent opportunity for customers to purchase high-end beauty and skincare products at significantly reduced prices, whether they're searching for the perfect Mother's Day gift or simply looking to treat themselves to some of the best beauty products on the market.
Online Exclusive Deal
However, there's a catch to this enticing offer. The dramatic price reduction on Vera Wang's Princess perfume is exclusively available online, necessitating customers to place their orders through the Boots website. This online-only deal ensures a convenient shopping experience while widening the reach to perfume lovers across the country. As the countdown to Mother's Day begins, the race is on to secure this sought-after fragrance before it sells out, highlighting the importance of acting swiftly to take advantage of this exceptional offer.
More Than Just Savings
Beyond the impressive discount on Vera Wang Princess, Boots is enriching the shopping experience with an array of deals and savings on a wide selection of beauty products. From early Christmas shopping hauls to special occasion gifts, customers are finding incredible value in the retailer's offerings. The Mother's Day beauty box, for instance, is turning heads with its lavish assortment of 18 beauty items, including eight full-size products from renowned brands like Liz Earle, Rituals, Elemis, No7, and more, all for just £45. This beauty box, along with other deals, exemplifies Boots' commitment to providing customers with premium beauty products at unbeatable prices.
The strategic discounts and special offers at Boots are not merely about the savings; they represent an opportunity for customers to explore and experience luxury beauty and fragrances without the premium price tag. As the beauty retail landscape continues to evolve, Boots is setting a precedent for accessibility and affordability, ensuring that high-quality beauty products are within reach for a broader audience. With Mother's Day around the corner, these offers serve as a reminder of the joy and appreciation that thoughtful gifts can bring, making luxury beauty an accessible indulgence for all.

author: @infobae
title: Condenan a 64 meses de prisión a excandidato presidencial colombiano por corrupción - Infobae
text:
Bogotá, 13 jun (EFE).- Un juez colombiano condenó a 64 meses de prisión al excandidato presidencial Rodolfo Hernández, que perdió las elecciones de 2022 con Gustavo Petro, por corrupción en la adjudicación de contratos cuando era alcalde de Bucaramanga (noreste).
En su decisión, el togado señaló que Hernández, de 79 años, fue hallado culpable, como autor directo, del "delito de interés indebido en la celebración de contratos", razón por la cual también fue inhabilitado para ejercer "derechos y funciones públicas" durante 80 meses.
Según el juez, Hernández es culpable de beneficiar a terceros en la adjudicación de un contrato para implementar nuevas tecnologías para tratar los residuos sólidos cuando fue alcalde de la ciudad de Bucaramanga, entre 2016 y 2019.
El exalcalde anunció que apelará la decisión de este juzgado de primera instancia.
El excandidato presidencial, que durante la audiencia en la que fue condenado reveló que padece un cáncer terminal, tenía un interés indebido en la asignación del contrato para el aprovechamiento y disposición final de residuos sólidos a la unión temporal Vitalogic RSU.
El objetivo era que con este contrato su hijo obtuviera beneficios económicos, por lo que Hernández se contactó con los representantes de la empresa que iba a implementar la nueva tecnología en Bucaramanga y les entregó información privilegiada para que tuvieran ventajas en la licitación.
Hernández, un magnate e ingeniero civil, irrumpió en la política nacional al presentarse como candidato a la Presidencia de Colombia en las elecciones de 2022 por el movimiento Liga de Gobernantes Anticorrupción con propuestas de corte populista anticorrupción.
Eso le valió pasar a segunda vuelta, en la que perdió con Petro, actual presidente de Colombia y cuyo mandato finalizará el 7 de agosto de 2026.
Gracias a ese resultado Hernández ganó un escaño en el Senado pero renunció dos meses después para enfocarse en el trabajo "por el país" desde su partido, con el que aspiró a la Gobernación del departamento de Santander el año pasado.

author: Joel Rose
title: Boeing Machinists union votes to strike | WSIU
text: The deal would have raised wages by 25%, lowered employees’ share of health care costs, and boosted retirement contributions by the company. In addition, Boeing promised that the company's next plane would be built at its facilities in the Pacific northwest — rather than at Boeing's non-unionized plant in South Carolina. But many rank and file union members were unhappy with the offer, which fell short of the 40% raise and pension changes that the union was seeking. The strike vote comes at a difficult time for Boeing, which is already grappling with a safety crisis after a door plug panel blew out of a 737 Max jet in midair in January. That forced the company to slow production of its best-selling plane as it works to shore up quality control across its factories and supply chain, and rebuild trust with airlines, regulators and the flying public. Before the vote, new Boeing CEO Kelly Ortberg urged workers to approve the contract. “A strike would put our shared recovery in jeopardy, further eroding trust with our customers and hurting our ability to determine our future together,” Ortberg said in a letter to employees in Washington and Oregon. The last strike by Boeing machinists in 2008 dragged on for eight weeks, costing the company an estimated $2 billion. Copyright 2024 NPR

author: Alexander Joe
title: A Complete Overview of Residential Solar Panels in Texas
text:
In recent years, the adoption of solar energy has gained significant traction across the United States, and Texas is no exception. With its ample sunshine and growing environmental consciousness, the Lone Star State has become a hotspot for residential solar panel installations. In this comprehensive guide, we’ll delve into the essentials of residential solar panels in Texas, covering everything from the benefits of solar energy to the process of solar panel installation.
Why choose solar in Texas?
Texas is blessed with plentiful sunshine, making it a perfect location for harnessing solar power. The country gets adequate sunlight over the course of 12 months, making solar panels a possible and efficient power solution for homeowners. By making an investment in solar panels, residents can reduce their reliance on conventional power resources, decrease their power bills, and contribute to a purer, more sustainable future.
Key Benefits of Solar Panel Installation in Texas
Cost Savings
- One of the primary reasons homeowners opt for solar panels in Texas is the potential for cost savings
.With solar energy, homeowners can significantly reduce their electricity bills, especially during peak sunlight hours when their panels are producing the most energy.
Effect on the Environment
- Solar strength is a simple, renewable resource that emits no air pollution or greenhouse gases. Homeowners may contribute to the battle against climate change and reduce their carbon footprint by using solar power.
Autonomy in Energy
- With solar panels, owners may produce their power and lessen their reliance on the grid, giving them a degree of electrical independence. This independence may be especially helpful in the event of grid interruptions or power outages.
Raise the value of a property
- Reselling a home with solar panels installed may result in a higher price. Texas homeowners are eager to pay top price for homes with solar panels because of the long-term financial and environmental advantages they provide.
Texas Solar Panel Installation Procedure
In Texas, solar panel installation often follows this organized process:
Evaluation: To begin, determine whether solar panels are a good fit for your home. An evaluation of factors such as available space, roof direction, and shading may help establish the best solar panel layout.
Design: Following the assessment, a specially created solar panel system will be created to meet your needs for strength. Together with panel arrangement, tilt attitude, and inverter selection, this layout will keep things in mind.
Permitting: Local authorities must provide permissions before setup may start. The permitting process guarantees that the solar panel device conforms with building regulations and guidelines.
Installation: Installing the solar panels on your roof or items is possible if the necessary licenses are obtained. This usually entails mounting the panels, wiring them into the power supply, and setting up the necessary tracking device.
Examination and Interconnection: Following setup, a final examination can be performed to ensure the machine satisfies safety and quality standards. You may start producing solar electricity after the system passes inspection and is linked to the grid.
Monitoring and Maintenance: To guarantee optimal performance after installation, tracking your solar panel device regularly and carrying out recurrent maintenance is essential. This might also include inspecting for damage, cleaning the panels, and examining the electrical parts.
Residential solar panels offer numerous benefits for homeowners in Texas, from cost savings to environmental sustainability. By harnessing the abundant sunshine available in the state, homeowners can take advantage of solar energy to power their homes efficiently and reduce their carbon footprint. With the right installation process and ongoing maintenance, solar panels can provide a reliable source of clean energy for years to come.
If you’re considering
solar panel installation in Texas, contact us today to learn more about how solar energy can benefit your home and how our team can assist you in making the switch to solar power.
